blackrockshooter:Aggressor.NAME: Aggressor
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal double damage and you take half damage from attacks. NL Enter #yOverheated at the start of your next turn.

blackrockshooter:Overheated.NAME: Overheated
DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal no damage and you take double damage from attacks. NL Exit this #yStance at the start of your next turn.
